article.title: Welcome to the Pennsylvania and Delaware U.S. Export Assistance Centers
article.summary: Learn more about the Pennsylvania and Delaware U.S. Export Assistance Centers.
article.content:
​​​

Helping U.S. Exporters Since 1980

"I cannot tell you how much I appreciate all of what the U.S. Commercial Service offices have done for us."
- Jay Giffen, Inside Sales & Marketing Manager at PBM, Inc.

The U.S. Commercial Service Export Assistance Centers in Pennsylvania are your first stop on the road toexporting success. With over30 years of experience assisting Pennsylvania and Delaware exporters, our trade specialists provide you with the knowledge and support you need to start or expand your export markets.

  • Philadelphia Office
  • Pittsburgh Office
  • Harrisburg Office**

**Note: For those companies who previously worked with our Harrisburg office, please find your county below for the Export Assistance Center that will be assisting you. Companies located in Adams, Berks, Cumberland, Dauphin, Franklin, Lancaster, Lebanon, and York counties will be assisted by the Philadelphia office. Companies in Juniata, Mifflin, Perry, Snyder, and Union counties will be assisted by the Pittsburgh office.


The U.S. Commercial Service assists U.S. companies in exporting in many different ways, with most assistance falling in the following categories:

  • Market Intelligenceto help U.S. exporters target the right market(s) for their products and services.
  • Export Counselingto provide firms with the information they need to navigate the export process from beginning to end.
  • Business Matchmakingservices to connect U.S. businesses with the right partners and prospects.
  • Trade Event Supporthelps U.S. exporters expand global sales at international trade fairs.
  • Trade Advocacysupport for U.S companies to level the international playing field for international procurement.​
